summary: Brian Chesky shares his contrarian approach to running Airbnb, including eliminating traditional product management, creating a single company roadmap, and why CEOs should be deeply involved in product details. He provides a comprehensive framework for organizational design that prioritizes functional alignment over divisional autonomy.
